    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2466</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Global Nitrogen Cycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Globale Stickstoffkreislauf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cycle d'Azote Global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Ciclo De Nitrogênio Global</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Ciclo Di Azoto Globale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σφαιρικός κύκλος αζώτου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Ciclo De Nitrógeno Global</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animated tutorial of the Global Nitrogen Cycle which includes the effects of man on the Cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Biogeochemical cycles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein lebhafter Tutorial des globalen 
Stickstoffkreislaufs, der die Effekte des Mannes auf der Schleife 
einschließt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un cours d'instruction animé du cycle d'azote 
global qui inclut les effets de l'homme sur le cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um tutorial animated do ciclo de nitrogênio 
global que inclui os efeitos do homem no ciclo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lezione privata animata del ciclo di azoto 
globale che include gli effetti dell'uomo sul ciclo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ζωντανεψοντα σεμινάριο του σφαιρικού κύκλου 
αζώτου που περιλαμβάνει τα αποτελέσματα του ατόμου στον κύκλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una guía animada del ciclo de nitrógeno global 
que incluye los efectos del hombre en el ciclo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biogeochemische Schleifen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
